cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 4th Nov 2025 (NZDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 4th Nov 2025 (NZDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

privates.name: Standard 6 Bed Apartment Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: This apartment features 3 lockable rooms, 1 bathroom, a living area and a kitchenette. Bedroom one has one double bed, Bedroom two has one double bed and Bedroom there has one double bed. Please note that the maximum occupancy is 4 guests .

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.
